name: My devil's voice (MLA)
description:
The infernal authorities entrusted the Ambitious Demon with a new business - to look after a small town. He is already ready to lead the inhabitants to the most terrible manifestations of the Fall in their lives, but, unfortunately, the heavenly administration also does not sleep and directs her to counterbalance the equally ambitious angel in order to maintain the balance of power. You have to help the demon in the confrontation with the angel and persuade the inhabitants of the city to fall into sin.

* Visual Novel with corruption of the main heroine.
* 3 endings.
* 4-8 hours for full walkthrough.
* more than 40 CG.

Original version of the game.
